name: Nhut
description:
Nhut is an Adventure/Platform game, where you control a sylvan. Collect all the fireflies of the world of Nhut with your home and feed the immense Bigbun.

Developped during the global game Jam 2019

Controls: 

Exclusively with a controller

Credits: 

MORENO Yan - 2D Artist, Character Artist

GALLAY Franck - Gameplay Programmer

GIMAZANE Tony - 2D Artist, Art Director, Environment Design

CHARBONNEL Youri - Game Designer, Level Designer, Sound Designer

LEGLISE Thibaut - Game Designer, Level Designer, Sound Designer

PLANTEY Leonard - Game Designer, Level Designer, 2D Animator
